name: JustBought.it
overview:
Do you enjoy discovering and shopping for awesome things? Justbought.it helps you find cool items by connecting you with people with similar taste and style as yours and recommending stores tailored to your shopping patterns. Imagine going shopping and having the option to ask your twitter and facebook friends’ opinions using our free iphone app or walking into a store and seeing what other’s have purchased using our new augmented reality app on the Android phones.

We call this social shopping - and it’s here to stay. At the heart of Justbought.it is a fun and engaging community of people who love to shop. We encourage you to share advice, feedback and product suggestions to make shopping a much fuller experience. And to top it off, earn rewards every time you post a purchase and unlock badges to become a trendsetter!

Let’s face it - aren’t you more likely to purchase an item a friend or co-worker recommended rather than venturing out on your own? With twitter and facebook tightly integrated, justbought.it makes sharing purchases fun and interactive - not to mention the instant feedback!
